thread.title: Quiz: Can you guess the films from these really bad plot summaries?
thread.title_full: Quiz: Can you guess the films from these really bad plot summaries?

title: Quiz: Can you guess the films from these really bad plot summaries?
text:
Can you guess these movies based on their terrible pitches? Updated February 20, 2017 15:33:28 Map: United States 
What's the worst way you can sum up the plot of a great movie? 
With a week to go until the Oscars, we've been having some fun asking followers of ABC News on Messenger to give us a terrible pitch for their favourite film. 
The idea was to make the movie sound as dull, ridiculous or just plain unwatchable as possible. 
Here are the top 30. Can you guess the movie based on the terrible pitch? 
(Oh and you should also join us Messenger to make sure you don't miss a thing from the Oscars next Monday...)
